title: How to investigate vocations
brief_description: Intended to motivate youngsters to investigate vocations and determine the kinds of work for which they are best suited. The film illustrates how to interpret vocational guidance tests, how to apply their information to different vocations, how to raise questions related to a specific job and how to gain actual job experience by taking employment during vacations.
